content: I just fixed a merge conflict. What do we want to do with this PR? Should I split off the linter? The indentation fixes should be uncontroversial, I think.
I say just hit merge and move on!
The indentation fixes look good! I'm having some trouble appreciating the linter though, please see my comments. If you prefer to split the linter to a new PR, I would be happy with that.
@Anne Baanen I don't have much time atm. But all your comments looked spot on to me.
I've split off the indentation linter into a new PR.
This PR now only changes whitespace (hopefully for the better :stuck_out_tongue_wink:)
See https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/10163/files?diff=unified&w=1 to convince your self that the only non-whitespace changes are still whitespace changes
